saao/saa15/P334673
a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}man-nu-ki-i-{URU}NINA lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-a DI-mu a-na KUR ša LUGAL EN-a {LU₂}ma-ta-a.a ša bat-te-bat-te-e-ni ne₂-e-hu u₃ a-ne₂-e-nu dul-li-in-ni ne₂-pa-aš₂ ŠA₃-bu ša LUGAL EN-ia lu DUG₃.GA ṭe₃-mu ša {KUR}NIM.MA-a.a ina x x x x x x x ina UGU {1}lu-du-u₂ x x x x x x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ ša {KUR}e-lam-a.a ša x x x x+x x+x-šu₂ ma-a pa-ni-u-te ša x x x x x x x+x-šu₂-nu ba x x x di x x x x x x x-MEŠ-šu₂-nu x+x x+x šu x x x x x {1}aš₂-pa-ba-ri {KUR}E₂-{LU₂}x+x x x x x x x x-a-te ša {KUR}e-lam-a.a x x x x x x x x x x x x x x {LU₂}GAL-URU-MEŠ-šu₂-nu {LU₂}GAL-URU-MEŠ-šu₂-nu i-du-u-ku x x x ip-ta-al-hu a-na KUR-u₂ e-te-li-u {1}{d}PA-LAL-an-ni ina UGU-hi-šu₂-nu a-sa-ap-ra it-tar-du-u-ni a-de-e is-se-e-šu₂ i-sa-ak-nu e-tar-bu ia-mut-tu₂ ina ŠA₃ URU-šu₂ kam-mu-su 02 {URU}ŠE-MEŠ TA@v qa-an-ni-šu₂-nu {LU₂}EN-MUD₂-MEŠ {LU₂}EN-MUD₂-MEŠ ša a-na {LU₂}GAL-URU-MEŠ-ni {LU₂}GAL-URU-MEŠ-ni i-du-ku-u-ni la u₂-ri-du-u-ni ŠEŠ-MEŠ-šu₂-nu a-na {1}{d}PA-LAL-in-an-ni iq-ṭi₂-bi-u₂ ma-a nu-še-ra-da-šu₂-nu ina pa-ni {LU₂}EN.NAM x x nu-bal-la-šu₂-nu ma-a a-x x x x x-šu₂-nu ki-ma it-tu-ri-du-ni ina UGU LUGAL EN-a u₂-še-ba-la-šu₂-nu
